roleset.name: complain about

role.descr: thing objected, topic of objection, often objected-to

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Conca repeated in his sentencing memorandum the same arguments made in his objection to the plea deal that he was not treated as an adult but as a youthful offender.
example.arg: to the plea deal that he was not treated as an adult but as a youthful offender.

example.name: With listener
example.text: In her objection to the judge, Mrs. Steele demanded to know who Fairfax's accomplices are so she can protect herself from them.
example.note: (note that here the objection is made to the judge, but the judge isn't the topic of the objection).

example.name: Compare to previous example
example.text: The plaintiff did not thereby give up her objection to the judge's failure to disqualify Mr. Seivert.
example.arg: to the judge's failure to disqualify Mr. Seivert.

roleset.note: Based on verb entry object.01 (differs from verb frame in presence of arg2 recipient), corresponds to VN entry complain-37.8. Framed by Claire.
